name: Suburban Robbery: VR
description:
Steal things on your wishlist from some guy's house. Made for 7DayFPS Jam 2022. This is our first game in Unreal!

Programming: Brandon Willoughby

Level Design: yuxu

Tools Used: Blender, Unreal Engine 5.1

Assets Used:
Kenney Furniture & Food Pack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/food-kit, https://www.kenney.nl/assets/furniture-kit
Low Poly Skateboard: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-skateboard-135446e9cd4a42d2bb08014df3f8...
Nintendo Switch Model (Low-poly) : https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/nintendo-switch-model-low-poly-42eb28c2528c4819b...
